entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Elk Island (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Elk Island National Park 1:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 4

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 12:57 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
